ygData.subject: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, for the past several days I have been trying to complete the Squad Ring quest in Riverdale.  I have given a whole bunch of necklaces to the Sheriff in
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, for the past several days I have been trying to complete the Squad
Ring quest in Riverdale. I have given a whole bunch of necklaces to the
Sheriff in Riverdale, a lot of belts to Deputy Budo, and killed a
crapload of goblins. The deputies consider me warmly...How can I tell
how much longer it will take me before I get the ring? Ive also killed
Mooto quite a few times.

Also, there is a NPC in Riverdale named Silna Stormsmith(sp?)...She goes
on about delivering messages to Freeport but I cannot get her to give me
the quest..Is the quest worth it? How do I go about getting it? If you
are coming out of Misty Thicket, Silna spawns down the hallway to the
left, next to that bench where deputies stand.

Also, any tips on doing the Nillipuss quest would be helpful...What
level do I have to be to kill him? How long does it take him to spawn?
Where does he spawn?

I would appreciate help on the Squad Ring quest the most...It is really
ticking me off that the stupid sherrif will not give me the ring...Once
I finally do get the ring, can I get it recharged or do I have to go get
a new one? If I can get it recharged, how do I do it? Im a level 16
monk.

Grimlin
Bristlebane server
